00027 #ifndef __BMO_SUBDIVIDE_H__
00028 #define __BMO_SUBDIVIDE_H__
00029 
00030 typedef struct SubDParams {
00031     int numcuts;
00032     float smooth;
00033     float fractal;
00034     //int beauty;
00035     short use_smooth;
00036     short use_sphere;
00037     short use_fractal;
00038     int seed;
00039     int origkey; /* shapekey holding displaced vertex coordinates for current geometry */
00040     BMOperator *op;
00041     float off[3];
00042 } SubDParams;
00043 
00044 typedef void (*subd_pattern_fill_fp)(BMesh *bm, BMFace *face, BMVert **verts,
00045                                      const SubDParams *params);
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * note: this is a pattern-based edge subdivider.
00049  * it tries to match a pattern to edge selections on faces,
00050  * then executes functions to cut them.
00051  */
00052 typedef struct SubDPattern {
00053     int seledges[20]; /* selected edges mask, for splitting */
00054 
00055     /* verts starts at the first new vert cut, not the first vert in the face */
00056     subd_pattern_fill_fp connectexec;
00057     int len; /* total number of verts, before any subdivision */
00058 } SubDPattern;
00059 
00060 /* generic subdivision rules:
00061  *
00062  * - two selected edges in a face should make a link
00063  *   between them.
00064  *
00065  * - one edge should do, what? make pretty topology, or just
00066  *   split the edge only?
00067  */
00068 
00069 #endif /* __BMO_SUBDIVIDE_H__ */
